user.title: HP/Aruba Switch Configuration
user.description: Enter the connection details for your HP/Aruba switch.

port_exclusion.title: Port Exclusion Configuration
port_exclusion.description:
Select which ports to exclude from the integration. Excluded ports will not create entities in Home Assistant.

**Exclude from Integration**: These ports will not appear in Home Assistant at all.

**Exclude from PoE Control**: These ports will appear but without PoE control options (use for non-PoE ports).

error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for more details.

init.title: Configure HP/Aruba Switch Options
init.description:
Update your HP/Aruba switch configuration. Changes will take effect on the next refresh cycle.

⚠️ Note: Host cannot be changed here. To connect to a different switch, delete and re-add the integration.

port_exclusion.description:
Select which ports to exclude from the integration. Excluded ports will not create entities in Home Assistant.

**Exclude from Integration**: These ports will not appear in Home Assistant at all.
